    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Answer
    The Answer Object represent the answer on a question (Metric) on a specific company on a specific year.
    AnswerImpl
     
    AnswerImpl.Builder
     
    AnswerItem
    The AnswerItem Object represents an answer on a Metric.
    AnswerQuery
    Class used to build an Answer Query
    AnswerStatus
     
    AssessmentType
     
    BadRequestException
     
    Card<K>
    Cards are the building blocks of all decko sites.
    CardImpl<K>
     
    CardImpl.Builder<T>
    Builder of new CardImpl instances
    CheckedBy<T>
    Users are able to flag an answer to request a check in case they have doubts that the answer is correct.
    CheckedByImpl
     
    CheckedByImpl.Builder
     
    Company
    In WikiRate, a Company represents any formal reporting organization, including corporations, NGOs, universities, and similar entities.
    CompanyCategory
     
    CompanyGroup
    Company Groups are company groupings based on user defined preferences.
    CompanyGroupImpl
     
    CompanyGroupImpl.Builder
     
    CompanyGroupQuery
    Class used to build a Company Group Query
    CompanyImpl
     
    CompanyImpl.Builder
     
    CompanyQuery
    Class used to build a Company Query
    Country
     
    Dataset
    Datasets are helping Users to structure information on WikiRate by combining Companies and Metrics associated with a particular theme or research.
    DatasetImpl
     
    DatasetImpl.Builder
     
    DatasetQuery
    Class used to build a Dataset Query
    ForbiddenException
     
    HTTPException
     
    HttpRequest
    An interface for HttpRequests
    HttpRequestImpl
     
    HttpRequestImpl.Builder
    Builder for new instances of HttpRequest
    IncompatibleCardTypeException
     
    LicenseType
     
    Metric
    A Wikirate Metric is used to measure company performance.
    MetricImpl
     
    MetricImpl.Builder
     
    MetricQuery
    Class used to build a Metric Query
    MetricType
     
    NotFoundException
     
    ProjectQuery
    Class used to build a Project Query
    ProjectStatus
     
    PublicationStatus
     
    Query<T>
    Class used to build a basic Query over the Wikirate API
    Region
    The Region entity extends the notion of a Card to provide additional information and functionality.
    RegionImpl
     
    RegionImpl.Builder
     
    Relationship
    Relation Metrics are a special type of metrics that produce special type of Relationship.
    RelationshipImpl
     
    RelationshipImpl.Builder
     
    RelationshipItem
    The RelationshipItem Object represents a relationship answer on a relationship metric type.
    RelationshipQuery
    Class used to build a Relationship Answer Query
    ReportType
     
    ResearchGroup
    Research Groups are a collection of WikiRate contributors, their Research Projects, and Metrics they created.
    ResearchGroupImpl
     
    ResearchGroupImpl.Builder
     
    ResearchGroupQuery
    Class used to build a Research Group Query
    SortBy
     
    Source
    A Source is generally a company report, including CSR Report, Sustainability Report, Annual Report or Integrated Report.
    SourceImpl
     
    SourceImpl.Builder
     
    SourceQuery
    Class used to build a Source Query
    SourceReference
     
    SourceReferenceImpl
     
    StringUtils
    StringUtils Class contains methods to help us process certain string values
    TestWikirateCardFactory
     
    TestWikirateClient
     
    TooManyRequestsException
     
    Topic
    Topics are used in Wikirate as a way to organize Metrics and other content into thematic groups.
    TopicFramework
     
    TopicImpl
     
    TopicImpl.Builder
     
    TopicQuery
    Class used to build a Topic Query
    UnauthorizedException
